references.paper_title: Mamba: Linear-time sequence modeling with selective state spaces
references.reason: This paper introduces the Mamba model, a state space model which this paper builds upon and analyzes.
This paper provides the strong baseline VMamba model which this paper improves upon.

references.paper_title: A theory of learning from different domains
references.reason: This paper is foundational to domain generalization and provides theoretical grounding for the work.

references.paper_title: Mixstyle neural networks for domain generalization and adaptation
references.reason: This paper introduces the Mixstyle method, which is compared to the proposed START method in this paper.

references.paper_title: Deeper, broader and artier domain generalization
references.reason: This paper introduces the PACS dataset, which is used for experimental evaluation in this paper.
